Reassigning to Platform. Community/newsgroups is to report problems with the
eclipse.org newsgroups or newsserver.
When reassigning, make sure you reassign to the owner, otherwise the bug gets lost.

This is an OutOfMemoryError. As you have no more memory we cannot allocate
anything to try and recover from this (you can see from the trace CDT and OSGI
are  also having trouble).

If you run with the -Xmx option (-Xmx 256M is a good choice) you will no longer
get these. In 3.1 this is built into the executable so there is no need to set
this parameter.
